response.overview: A documentary from the early '90s that features top dance crews from New York and several big-name Hip-Hop dancers from that era including Mop Top Crew (Buddha Stretch, Peter Paul, Caleaf, Henry Link, E-Joe) and Misfitss (Rubberband, Marquest, Kito, Peek A Boo, Prancer). The 26-minute film was first released in 1992 and talks about the evolution of Hip-Hop dance styles and highlights the sleek “New Style” (short for New York Style) dance moves of that time.
response.title: WRECKIN SHOP (Live from brooklyn)
